attributes.review: This app crashed my brand new phone! Are you kidding me!!! I should have known when it took so long to download!!! No wonder it has so many 1 star reviews. Wish I could give it a 0

attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE 😾I am a 58 year old female and was a huge trump supporter but unfortunately I have to move to the left because of this app and trump being a horrible person. Once I opened the app my phone started glitching out 😡😡. Then all the devices in my home turned on and started showing and playing TRUMP 2020. THEN OUT OF NOWHERE MY 16 YEAR OLD SON CAME DOWN THE STAIRS WITH HIS FISH AND THEY BOTH KEPT REPEATING TRUMP 2020 🤬. This all stoped when I deleted the app. This app is absolutely horrible do not download. Also it’s very glitchy and slow.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. HORRIBLE AND UGLY APP JUST LIKE TRUMP 👹🤢😡🤬

attributes.review: I first downloaded this app as a way to get in touch with America’s president, aka the orange blob of a donut. I wanted to support the non racist, non sexist, non homophobic president! As soon as I downloaded it asked me for my location and I thought “that’s not a vibe fam I would like to keep that private.” I decided since I didn’t want to give my location that I should delete it. Not 5 minutes after, I heard selener knocking on my door. I thought that was weird because I normally keep an eye out for selener 👁👄—  . She began to force me to re download the app and I was very scared so I began to run away but as soon as I thought I got away from selener I turned around to see an orange blob run after me telling be to redownload the app! Needless to say I will now be doing a write in vote for Kanye 😫✌🏽. Still being chased.
attributes.title: Send help: being chased by deep fried carrot.

attributes.review: ^ikyk. Also because a classmate is obsessed with trump and I despise this classmate more than I despise Donald trump if that says anything. AND the app is terrible anyway!!!!!! It kept sending messages for me and wouldn’t let my FaceTime work. It was also changing my names on my social media to something weird. I think it was zucchini Johnson. Ew. Right? Anyway, don’t download this app. Unless you’re from the same video that I am. Then that means you have to download it to write a review. Okey Dokey byeeee
attributes.title: I’m from that video
